userProperties.name: Deletion
userProperties.value: All files older than 3 days got deleted from tables folder

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Empno as string,
		EmpName as string,
		Location as string,
		Job as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		EmpName as string,
		Location as string,
		Job as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 derive(dummy = 'dummy') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(dummy),
	maxid = max(Empno)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1, source2 join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 keyGenerate(output(Empno as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(Empno = toString(Empno+toInteger(maxid))) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		Empno,
		EmpName,
		Location,
		Job
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source1, Select1 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['StructuredData.Csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Name = Empno,
		EmpName,
		Location,
		Job
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empno as string,
		EmpName as string,
		Location as string,
		Job as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Colligues
source(output(
		Empno as string,
		EmpName as string,
		Location as string,
		Job as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> NewColligues
Colligues, NewColligues union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 aggregate(groupBy(Empno),
	each(match(name!='Empno'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sort(asc(Empno, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Name as string,
		Category as string,
		Status as string,
		Error as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['ConsoladatedList.Csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Date as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Company as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Location as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Description = 'File_1.Csv') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 split(isNull(toDate(Date,'dd-mm-yyyy')),
	isNull(toInteger(ProductName)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ErrorRow, Errorrow2, GoodRows)
ConditionalSplit1@ErrorRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Date as string,
		ProductName as string,
		company as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Location as string,
		Description as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table sales_faulty_data;'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Date,
		ProductName,
		company = Company,
		Quantity,
		Location,
		Description
	)) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@GoodRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Date as string,
		ProductName as string,
		company as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Location as string,
		Description as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@Errorrow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Date as string,
		ProductName as string,
		company as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Location as string,
		Description as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3

source(output(
		Date as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Company as string,
		Quantity as short,
		Location as string,
		ProductID as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> productDetails
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Brand as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductNo
productDetails aggregate(groupBy(ProductID),
	NoOfProducts = count(ProductName)) ~> aggregate
aggregate, ProductNo join(toString(aggregate@ProductID) == ProductNo@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['UpdatedProductDetails.Csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Brand,
		NoOfProducts
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empno as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Location as string,
		Job as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Empno as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Location as string,
		Job as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Empno'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Empno,
		EmpName,
		Location,
		Job
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> table1
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> table2
table1, table2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@id == source2@id,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table t3;'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		id = source1@id,
		name = source1@name
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@id == source2@id,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table t33;'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		id = source1@id,
		name = source1@name
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 lookup(source1@id == source2@id,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		id = source1@id,
		name = source1@name
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 exists(source1@id == source2@id,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table t3;'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		empno as integer,
		ename as string,
		job as string,
		sal as decimal(19,4),
		comm as decimal(19,4),
		deptno as integer,
		hiredate as date,
		mgr as integer,
		total as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(deptno==10,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(deptno10, RestAllDepts)
ConditionalSplit1@deptno10 sort(asc(empno, false),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> Sort1
ConditionalSplit1@RestAllDepts filter(deptno!=40) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(asc(empno, false)) ~> Sort2
Sort2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(EmpId = substring(Column_1, 1, 4),
		EmpName = substring(Column_1, 5, 10),
		DeptName = substring(Column_1, 15, 2),
		Salary = substring(Column_1, 17, 5),
		MobNo = substring(Column_1, 22, 10)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		EmpId,
		EmpName,
		DeptName,
		Salary,
		MobNo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmpNo as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		DeptName as string,
		sal as decimal(19,4),
		MobNo as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		EmpNo = EmpId,
		EmpName,
		DeptName,
		sal = Salary,
		MobNo
	)) ~> sink1
